Additional info: clicking the [Add new rule](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2767162/24172308/5a77c0ce-0e4d-11e7-8a52-abe5dc000d5b.png) button doesn't do anything, but it should add a new style for the selected element's class/selector. The same CSP error as above is printed in the JS console:

```Content Security Policy: The page’s settings blocked the loading of a resource at self (“default-src https://localhost:8000”).```
